account-area.diagnosis-info-not-copied: 진단 정보를 클립보드에 복사할 수 없습니다.
account-area.non-ata-tooltip: MeanFi는 연결된 토큰 계정으로 작동합니다. {{tokenSymbol}} 계정을 병합하세요.

assets.account-add-heading: 모든 주소에 대한 계정 세부 정보 보기
assets.loading-error: 거래정보를 로드할 수 없습니다. 페이지를 새로고침하세요.
assets.no-asset-selected: 선택된 자산이 없습니다. 왼쪽에 있는 것을 선택해주세요.

close-stream.cant-close-message: 잠긴 트레저리에서 스트림을 끝낼 수 없습니다.
close-stream.cant-topup-message: 잠긴 트레저리에서 스트림을 충전할 수 없습니다.
close-stream.context-beneficiary: 스트림을 종료하면 귀하의 계정({{수익자}})으로 베스팅된 금액이 전송되고 머니스트림이 즉시 중지됩니다.
close-stream.context-treasurer-aditional-message: The above amounts are only accurate for paused and ended streams. For live steams, the amounts will be determined the moment the stream is closed.
close-stream.context-treasurer-multiple-beneficiaries: 스트림을 종료하면 머스스트림이 중지되고, 베스팅된 금액을 수익자({{beneficiary}})에게 보내고, 베스팅되지 않은 금액을 원래 트레저리({{treasury}})로 되돌려줍니다.
close-stream.context-treasurer-single-beneficiary: 스트림을 종료하면 머니스트림이 중지되고 베스팅된 금액을 수익자({{beneficiary}})에게 보내고 베스팅되지 않은 금액을 기여자에게 반환합니다.

donation-fund.description: 기금이 올바른 목적에 사용될 것이라는 마음의 평화를 가지고 누구나 기부할 수 있는 계정을 만드십시오.
donation-fund.name: 기부기금

fundraising.description: 시드, 시리즈, ICO, DAICO, 프라이빗 라운드에서 자금을 조달하고 싶으십니까? 기금 모금 계약서만 보세요.
fundraising.name: 모금활동

otp.description: 한 번만 다른 사람에게 송금하거나 결제 일정을 잡습니다. 이 옵션을 사용하여 원하는 모든 비용을 지불하세요.
otp.name: 일시불

payroll.description: 기존 은행 서비스의 오버헤드 없이 전 세계 어디에서나 직원 또는 계약자를 위한 급여를 설정합니다.
payroll.name: 급여

pension-fund.description: 퇴직 연령 도달과 같은 적격한 사건에 대해 직원에게 급여를 지급하는 연금 계획을 설정하는 고용주의 경우.
pension-fund.name: 연금(자금)

real-estate-sale-escrow.description: 부동산 거래를 위한 에스크로 계정을 설정합니다. 판매자와 구매자는 무료로 직접 액세스하고 전체 감사를 받습니다.
real-estate-sale-escrow.name: 부동산매각(에스크로우)

rent-collection.description: 임차인을 위한 임대료 징수를 설정하십시오. 그들이 당신의 재산을 점유하는 모든 분에 대해 실시간으로 돈을 받으십시오.
rent-collection.name: 임대료징수

repeating.description: 시간이 지남에 따라 고정된 흐름 속도로 누구에게나 돈을 보내십시오. 가족 송금, 자녀 수당 등에 적합합니다.
repeating.name: 반복 지불

setup-everything.description: 일반적으로 사용되지 않는 고유한 조건으로 계약을 설정하려는 전문가에게 권장됩니다.
setup-everything.name: 모두 설정(고급)

subscription.description: 정기 멤버십 결제를 위한 SaaS 구독 계약을 설정합니다. Netflix 또는 월별 Gym Club 멤버십을 생각해 보십시오.
subscription.name: 구독

first-container.text-one: We provide secure custody solutions for institutions and individuals alike so they can safely invest in crypto assets.
first-container.text-three: Dedicated Support Team that guides you during the onboard process and help you resolve any challenge.
first-container.text-two: With MeanFi Trading, access multiple venues through one onboarding. Borrow crypto or USD against crypto collateral, or lend and earn returns on assets under custody.

custody.heading: Crypto Asset Custody

second-container.text: We're a team of engineers, designers, and crypto experts who believe that the future is digital assets. However, with no way to securely store them right now we feel like our hands are tied behind our back. So we decided to build MeanFi Custody so that you can finally make your money work for you!
second-container.title: WHY MEANFI CUSTODY

custody.subheading: The most advanced digital asset platform, for secure crypto custody, trading, staking, governance, and more.

third-container.text: MeanFi supports assets that meet our standards of quality and safety. Our list includes USDC, USDT, SOL, DAI, and more. We are always looking to grow our portfolio with new Assets. To learn more about our roadmap, please get in touch.
third-container.title: Supported Assets

ddca-setup-modal.headline: Buy {{fromTokenAmount}} worth of {{toTokenSymbol}} {{recurrencePeriod}} for {{totalPeriod}}, starting today.

notes.note-item-02: 예정된 스왑에 대한 수수료는 선불로 청구됩니다.
notes.note-item-03: 사용하지 않은 모든 수수료는 인출시 귀하에게 반환됩니다.

ddcas.setup-close-warning: 클릭하지 않고 종료합니다. 시작은 첫 번째 구매를 건너뜁니다. 닫으시겠습니까?

deposits.address-share-disclaimer: 이 주소는 Solana에서 SOL 및 SPL 토큰을 받는 데만 사용할 수 있습니다.
deposits.heading: 당신의 카드, 계좌 또는 다른 블록체인에서 당신의 Solana 지갑으로 직접 입금
deposits.renbridge-cta-warning: 체이스 은행(미국) 신용 카드 및 직불 카드는 암호화폐 구매에 사용할 수 없습니다. 다른 은행은 모두 가능합니다.

error-screens.service-unavailable-message: 현재 네트워크에 장애가 있습니다. 잠시 후 다시 시도하십시오.

faucet.not-connected: 지갑이 연결되지 않았습니다. 지갑을 연결해 주세요.

general.not-connected: 지갑이 연결되지 않았습니다. 지갑을 연결해 주세요.

panel-left.not-connected: Please connect your wallet to see your invest options

panel-right.first-text: MEAN staking rewards include emission incentives plus a share of the protocol revenues. When you stake your MEAN, you get sMEAN (staked MEAN) in return.

liquidity-pool.text-one: MEAN Liquidity Pools are currently available on Orca and Raydium with multiple pools including MEAN/SOL, MEAN/RAY and MEAN/USDC.
liquidity-pool.text-two: To invest in a liquidity pool, you need to supply both tokens that make up the pool. For example, when you join the Raydium MEAN/USDC pool both MEAN and USDC tokens are required. For more details, see the adding liquidity guides on
liquidity-pool.text-three: Before you add funds to a pool, be sure to read and accept the risks associated with investing in a liquidity pool.
liquidity-pool.title: MEAN Liquidity Pools

panel-right.second-text: Simply holding your sMEAN is all that is required to continuously grow your MEAN stash. You don't need to harvest the rewards with MEAN staking. When you unstake your sMEAN, you will receive the rewards earned in the form of additional MEAN on top of the amount staked.

staking-sol.title: Liquid SOL Staking
staking-sol.text-one: Liquid SOL staking is currently available with three providers on Solana. These are Lido (stSOL), Marinade (mSOL) and Socean (scnSOL).
staking-sol.text-two: Before you stake your SOL, be sure to read and accept the risks associated when staking with one of these providers.

staking-data.text-two: Locking boost periods are coming soon to earn even more MEAN!
staking-data.title: Your Current Stake:

stats.staking-apy-tooltip: The APY associated with sMEAN is a representation of the price of sMEAN over a 365 day period.

stake.name: Stake
stake.notification-label: Staking period of {{periodValue}} {{periodTime}} will lock your Tokens until {{unstakeStartDate}}.
stake.period-label: How long do you want to stake for?
stake.terms-and-conditions-tooltip: Your tokens will be locked for the period of time selected and you will not be able to unstake them before the staking period ends. When you stake additional tokens to an existing contract, the staking period will be extended to the new end date for ALL of the tokens locked.
stake.verified-label: I agree to the Terms & Conditions

unstake.name: Unstake
unstake.notification-label-one: Your currently have {{stakedAmount}} sMEAN staked which is currently locked until {{unstakeStartDate}}
unstake.notification-label-one-error: You currently don't have any sMEAN.
unstake.notification-label-two: Unstaking will withdraw the specified amount of unlocked sMEAN tokens to your wallet
unstake.verified-label: I agree to the Terms & Conditions
unstake.success-transaction-message: {{sMeanValue}} sMEAN has been successfully unstaked and you have received {{meanValue}} MEAN in return.

panel-right.title: Stake MEAN to Earn MEAN Rewards

create-asset.success-message: Your multisig vault was created successfully
create-asset.token-placeholder: Enter the address of the token mint

create-multisig.fee-info-label: The fee to create this multisig is
create-multisig.multisig-address-used-as-participant: Cannot use a multisig address as participant
create-multisig.multisig-label-placeholder: Type a name for your multisig
create-multisig.multisig-participants-warning-message: It is not recommended to create a Multisig with the same number of participants as required signatures
create-multisig.multisig-threshold-placeholder: 다중서명 계정에 필요한 최소 서명 입력
create-multisig.multisig-threshold-question-mark-tooltip: As best practice, always have more multisig signers than the minimum required signers. A 2-of-3 multisig is the most basic setup where 2 of the 3 participants are required to execute a transaction.

multisig-account-detail.no-multisig-loaded: 세부사항을 확인할 멀티시그를 생성 또는 선택하세요

multisig-accounts.not-connected: 멀티시그 계좌를 보기 위해 지갑을 연동하세요

delete-asset.explanatory-paragraph: By submitting this proposal, you will sign the transaction and approve it as one of the Multisig signers. Before the asset is deleted, the other Multisig members need to approve it.
delete-asset.warning-message: Only empty assets can be deleted. To delete an asset you need to first transfer all funds to another account.

multisig-assets.explanatory-paragraph: By submitting this proposal, you will sign the transaction and approve it as one of the Multisig signers. Before the funds are sent, the other Multisig members need to approve it.
multisig-assets.not-connected: Please connect your wallet to see vaults
multisig-assets.refresh-tooltip: Click to refresh the list of vaults

multisig-mints.multisig-already-owns-the-mint: Selected multisig is already authority for this vault
multisig-mints.not-connected: Please connect your wallet to see mints
multisig-mints.refresh-tooltip: Click to refresh the list of mints

multisig-transactions.missing-signature: To execute this proposal, {{missingSignature}} more signature is needed.
multisig-transactions.missing-signatures: To execute this proposal, {{missingSignature}} more signatures are needed.
multisig-transactions.no-transactions-multisig-asset: This multisig asset has no transactions
multisig-transactions.no-transactions-multisig-mint: This multisig mint has no transactions
multisig-transactions.no-transactions-multisig-program: This multisig program has no transactions
multisig-transactions.ready-for-execution: This transaction is now ready for execution. Please tell the person who initiated this transaction to execute it.
multisig-transactions.signers-to-approve: signers to approve it in order to be executed.
multisig-transactions.transaction-awaiting: A proposal for this multisig is pending
multisig-transactions.treasury-closed-warning: When a treasury is closed, all funds left over will be deposited back into the multisig safe.
multisig-transactions.tx-operation-pending-one: This transaction is ready for execution. Please tell the person who initiated this transaction to execute it.
multisig-transactions.tx-operation-pending-two: A transaction on this Multisig is ready for
multisig-transactions.tx-operation-voided: This pending transaction has been VOIDED due to the Multisig being edited.
multisig-transactions.tx-operation-executed: This transaction has already been executed
multisig-transactions.tx-operation-expired: This transaction has already been expired
multisig-transactions.not-sign-tx: You did NOT sign this transaction
multisig-transactions.not-signed-tx: You have NOT signed this transaction
multisig-transactions.tx-operation-cancel: Please cancel it below to remove it from the list.
multisig-transactions.proposal-ready-to-be-executed: This proposal has received the required number of signatures and is now ready to be executed.
multisig-transactions.proposal-completed: This proposal has been executed and is now complete.

multisig.refresh-tooltip: 다중서명 계정 목록을 새로 고치려면 클릭하십시오.

transfer-authority.asset-auth-destination-address-disclaime: I confirm the above New Authority Address entered or selected is a Multisig Account address and NOT a regular wallet address. I acknowledge that if I provide a non Multisig address, it will cause a permanent loss of the vault and its funds.
transfer-authority.multisig-already-owns-the-asset: Selected multisig is already authority for this vault

update-multisig.edit-not-allowed-message: When you edit a Multisig, all pending transactions will be VOIDED. Make sure there are no important transactions needing to be completed.
update-multisig.success-message: 다중서명 계정에 대한 변경 사항이 저장되었습니다!

proposal-modal.title: Proposal title
proposal-modal.summary-content-send-funds: Send {{amount}} {{symbol}} to the following Solana address:
proposal-modal.summary-content-transfer-ownership: Transfer ownership to the following Solana address:
proposal-modal.expires-tooltip: If the confirmation threshold is not passed by the expiry date, the transaction will be automatically cancelled and its status will be displayed as failed.

notifications.error-cannot-fund-account-message: 계정에 자금을 공급할 수 없습니다. 나중에 다시 시도해 주세요.
notifications.error-creating-vault-message: 볼트를 만들 수 없습니다. 나중에 다시 시도해 주세요.
notifications.error-loading-streamid-message: ID가 {{streamId}}인 스트림을 찾거나 로드할 수 없습니다.
notifications.error-loading-treasuryid-message: ID가 {{treasuryId}}인 트레저리를 찾거나 열 수 없습니다.
notifications.error-sending-transaction: Error submitting the transaction, please try again.
notifications.network-connection-down: 네트워크 연결이 없습니다. 앱이 오프라인 상태입니다!
notifications.network-performance-low: Solana 네트워크의 성능이 저하되고 있습니다. 거래가 전송 또는 확인되지 않을 수 있습니다.

notifications.tx-not-confirmed: The transaction could not be confirmed, please retry your transaction.

referrals.address-invalid: 추천 주소가 유효한 솔라나 주소가 아닙니다.
referrals.refer-friend-hint: 친구를 추천하고 $100 상당의 암호화폐를 교환할 때 MEAN 토큰으로 최대 $25 획득

market.token-circulating-suppply: 시장에서 유통되고 있고 공개된 코인의 양. 주식시장에서 유통되는 주식과 유사하다.
market.token-fully_dilluted_market_cap: 암호화폐 순환 공급의 총 시장 가치. 이는 주식 시장의 유동 자본화와 유사합니다. 시가 총액 = 현재 가격 x 순환 공급
market.token-holders: 암호 화폐 투자에 대한 장기적인 접근 방식을 나타내는 열정을 가진 사람들
market.token-total-money-streams: 머니 스트리밍 프로그램에 의해 생성된 시간 경과에 따른 총 연속 지불 횟수
market.token-total-supply: 이미 생성된 코인의 양에서 소각된 코인을 뺀 값입니다. 이는 주식시장의 발행주식수와 유사하다.
market.token-total-value-locked: 특정 프로토콜에 현재 스테이킹되는 자산의 수
market.token-total-volume: 지난 24시간 동안 암호화폐가 얼마나 거래되었는지 측정

status.tx-send-failure-smallamount: 거래 제출 실패. 스왑 금액이 너무 작습니다.

transaction-info.add-funds-repeating-payment-advice: 반복 결제를 시작하려면 자금을 추가해야 합니다.

create-treasury.create-multisig-treasury-success: 다중서명 승인을 위해 제출된 트레저리 요청을 시작합니다.
create-treasury.multisig-treasury-created-info: 트레저리 설정을 완료하려면 다른 다중서명 서명자가 승인해야 합니다.
create-treasury.multisig-treasury-created-instructions: 이 트레저리 생성 트랜잭션에 서명하도록 다른 사용자에게 요청하십시오.
create-treasury.treasury-name-placeholder: Type a name for your streaming treasury

treasury-type-options.treasury-type-locked-description: 잠긴 트레저리를 사용하면 투자자에게 필요한 것과 같은 예약 할당에 대한 베스팅 계약처럼 작동하는 스트림을 생성할 수 있습니다. 일반적으로 종료 날짜가 정해져 있습니다.
treasury-type-options.treasury-type-open-description: 열린 트레저리를 사용하면 무기한으로 실행되는 자금 흐름을 만들 수 있습니다. 트레저리에 돈이 떨어지면 채워질 때까지 모든 흐름이 멈춥니다.

open-treasury.treasuryid-placeholder: Mean Finance에 의해 만든 트레저리 ID

treasury-detail.multisig-tx-headsup: 이 트레저리에 대한 승인 또는 실행 보류 중인 거래
treasury-detail.no-treasury-loaded: 트레저리를 생성하거나 조회하여 세부 정보를 봅니다.
treasury-detail.no-treasury-selected: 세부 정보를 보려면 트레저리를 선택하거나 조회하세요.

treasury-list.multisig-treasury-help: Below is a list of all the treasuries that are connected to this Multsig

add-stream-locked.panel2-cliff-release-inner-label: What amount is released on commencement?
add-stream-locked.panel2-summary: Specify the vesting terms for {{recipientNote}} below. You will be sending {{fromCoinAmount}} {{selectedTokenName}} to {{recipientShortenAddress}} using these terms and schedule.
add-stream-locked.panel3-warning-message: IMPORTANT: This is a locked money stream. You cannot cancel, pause or change its details once it is started. Verify all information before proceeding.

treasury-streams.create-multi-recipient-checkbox-label: Do you want to create multiple streams with the same settings?
treasury-streams.fee-payed-by-treasurer: 수익자 대신 이 스트림에 대한 수수료를 지불하고 싶습니다.
treasury-streams.message-warning: The list of recipients you submitted included your own wallet address. This is not possible and this address has been removed from the imported list.
treasury-streams.minimum-allocation-advice: 이 자금 흐름에 대한 최소 할당을 트레저리에서 사용 가능한 할당되지 않은 잔액까지 설정해야 합니다.
treasury-streams.multiple-address-question-mark-tooltip:
Please provide a csv text file with one address per line in the following format: 
 MEMO or STREAM NAME, WALLET ADDRESS. 

 Here is an example of how it should look: 
 Epoch 1, FrdFf3EqcGuytTweLvoELBt29WrAGVYjrh4585A2bTAZ 

 Before you submit the file, please make sure the recipient addresses are correct and do not belong to an exchange.
treasury-streams.no-streams: This streaming treasury has no active streams

modal.title: Withdraw treasury funds
modal.verified-label: I'm sure the recipient address doesn't belong to an exchange

wrap.hint-message: We recommend having at least 0.05 SOL for any transaction
